ら。
Naegles - QC2: Just relax. You won't have anything to be afraid of anymore, Nao-san.
NOTES: from "That's a relief. Nao-san, you have nothing to fear at all.

Lloro - QC: そ、それは頼もしいです……。
Naegles - QC2: Th-that's reassuring...

Lloro - QC: これ、わかる？
Naegles - QC2: See this?

Lloro - QC: 魅音さんが、鍵穴を指さすのだが、何も不審には見えない。
Naegles - QC2: Mion-san pointed at the keyhole, but I didn't see what she meant.
NOTES: this door trick convo needs to be looked over

Lloro - QC:
知らないなら、敢えて詳細は伏せるけど。……これ、実はささやか
な細工がしてあるんだよ。
Naegles - QC2: If you don't get it, you don't need to know the details... but there's actually a tiny device I set here.
NOTES: this is a neat little thing. -> there's actually a tiny device I set here.

Lloro - QC: え？　どういうことですか？
Naegles - QC2: Huh? What do you mean?

Lloro - QC: 詳しくは言えませんけれど。細工を外さないで鍵を挿し込むと、シリンダーが詰まって壊れるんです。
Naegles - QC2: I can't go into specifics, but if you insert the key while it's inside, the cylinder will jam and break.
NOTES: something else is -> it's

Lloro - QC:
傍目にはわからないよ。つまり、細工をした本人が細工を外すま
で、絶対にこの扉は開かないということ。
Naegles - QC2: An onlooker wouldn't realize it's there. Basically, until the person who created the device takes it out, the door will absolutely not open.
NOTES: from "You can't really see it. In short, if this trick is used on the the door, then absolutely no one can open it.

Lloro - QC:
仮に、細工に気付いたところで、外そうとすればそれ、形が変わっ
てしまいますので、入室を許した証拠は残る。
Naegles - QC2: Supposing someone {i}did{/i} notice the device, even if they tried to remove it, it would change shape, and there would be evidence that they got in.
NOTES: from "Even if you notice the trick, if you try to remove it, it will change shape, and there would be evidence you entered the room.

Lloro - QC:
園崎姉妹が何の話をしているのかよくわからないが、要はこうい
うことだ。
Naegles - QC2: I don't know what the Sonozakis were talking about at all, but this was the gist:

Lloro - QC:
朝、この部屋を出て施錠した時に、鍵穴に妙な細工をしたのだ。
　それに気付かずに、何者かが鍵を挿し込んで開けようとすると、
鍵穴が詰まり、壊れて開かなくなるのだ。
Naegles - QC2: When she left the room this morning and locked the door, she made a strange modification to the keyhole. If someone tries to open the door by inserting the key without realizing it, the keyhole will jam and be unable to open.

Lloro - QC:
……もし仮に、使用人の人が掃除でもしようと思ってマスターキー
を使ってたら、大変なことに……。
Naegles - QC2: ...Although, a servant with a master key trying to open it for cleaning would be in a lot of trouble.
NOTES: who tried -> trying

Lloro - QC: その為に、これをぶら下げておいたんじゃないですか。
Naegles - QC2: That's why you left this hanging, right?

Lloro - QC: ベッドメイク不要の札。これで、使用人の人も、入る必要がない。
Naegles - QC2: A "Bedmaking Not Necessary" tag. If a servant sees that, there'd be no reason for them to enter.

Lloro - QC:
もちろん、犯人がこの細工に気付き、取り外そうと試みる可能性
もゼロではない。
Naegles - QC2: Of course, the probability of the culprit noticing this device and trying to remove it isn't zero.
NOTES: from "However, the culprit might notice this trick and remove it, rendering the whole thing moot.

Lloro - QC:
しかし、園崎姉妹が言うには、そうすれば必ず痕跡が残るという
のだ。
Naegles - QC2: However, what the sisters are saying is that, if that {i}does{/i} happen, it will absolutely leave behind evidence.
NOTES: from "But if what the Sonozakis are saying is true, there should be a sign of entry.

Lloro - QC:
だから、この細工の意味を知っている犯人なら、マスターキーは
もちろんのこと、ピッキングさえも諦めざるを得ないのだ。
Naegles - QC2: Even if the culprit knew what this device was, continuing to go at it with a master key or even a lockpick would of course bear no fruit.
NOTES: from "Even if the culprit noticed this trick, they would either have to have a master key or pick the lock.

Lloro - QC:
この技、ホントに内緒だからね？　下手に真似されると、各方面に
迷惑が掛かるからね。
Naegles - QC2: This trick is a secret, alright? If any amateurs try doing it, we're gonna have to batten the hatches.
NOTES: from "If anyone else tries to copy it, it'll be bad for all of us.

Lloro - QC: 真似できないし、したくもありませんのでご安心を……。
Naegles - QC2: I can't come up with something like that and I don't intend to, so don't worry...
NOTES: from "Don't worry, I don't intend to

Lloro - QC: それで……、その細工は大丈夫だったんですか？　誰の痕跡も？
Naegles - QC2: That said... this trick works, right? Any signs of entry?

Lloro - QC:
うん。私が施錠してから今の瞬間まで、誰も開錠しなかったことを
証明してるよ。
Naegles - QC2: Nope. This proves that from when I locked it earlier to unlocking it just now, nobody else opened it.

Lloro - QC:
それでも魔法陣があったら………、これはもう本当に……魔女の
仕業…………。
Naegles - QC2: But if a magic circle was there... it would actually be the work of a witch.
NOTES: still appeared -> was there

Lloro - QC: お姉。カウントダウンでドアを開けて下さいな。
Naegles - QC2: Sis, let's open it on the count of three.

Lloro - QC: ＯＫ！　スリー、ツー、ワン！
Naegles - QC2: Okay! Three, two, one!

Lloro - QC: そ、そういうのフラグになるんで、粛々と開けて下さい……。
Naegles - QC2: P-Please don't announce it like that, just open the door quietly...

Lloro - QC:
……おや。どうしたんですか？　まさか、#p鍵#s・#r#p穴#s・#r#pに#s・#r#pゴ#s・#r#pミ#s・#r#pで#s・#r#pも#s・#r#p入#s・#r#pれ#s・#r#pて#s・#r壊
しちゃったんですか？
Naegles - QC2: ...Oh my, what's going on here? Don't tell me you {i}put some garbage in the keyhole{/i} and broke it?

Lloro - QC: えー？　そんなことしないってぇ。
Naegles - QC2: Eh? We did nothing of the sort.

Lloro - QC: てっきり、昨日は窓の鍵、今度は扉の鍵を壊してしまったのかと思いました。
Naegles - QC2: I was certain that you had broken the lock on your door this time after breaking the window lock yesterday.
NOTES: from "Yesterday it was the window lock, and now today you're going to break the door lock?

Lloro - QC:
やっぱり茅葺き屋根の村からいらっしゃった方々には、洋風な扉は
扱いが慣れていないのかと思いまして。
Naegles - QC2: You had me thinking that people from thatched-roof villages really weren't used to handling Western doors.
NOTES: from "I knew people from thatched-roof villages weren't used to seeing Western-style doors.

Lloro - QC: 私たちのことはお構いなく。お帰りなさい、ヱリカさん。
Naegles - QC2: Don't worry about us. Welcome back, Erika-san.

Lloro - QC:
今回のバカンスは、薔薇庭園にゆったりと過ごす暇はほとんどな
く、……終始、ヱリカさんとバチバチやりあっている気がする。
Naegles - QC2: I feel like throughout this entire vacation, even while I {i}meant{/i} to spend my free time in the rose garden, Erika-san has constantly been starting fights with me.
NOTES: in what was supposed to be a peaceful -> while I {i}meant{/i} to spend my free time in the

Lloro - QC:
ヱリカさんの挑発的な態度と、園崎姉妹の喧嘩の訪問買取が噛み
合ってしまったのだ……。
Naegles - QC2: Erika-san's provocative attitude combined with the Sonozaki sisters' fighting over their paid visit...

Lloro - QC:
アンケートには、この島が貸し切りだったなら、もっと最高でし
たって、書いておこう……。
Naegles - QC2: I think I'll write in the questionnaire that this island would be better off reserved...
NOTES: survey -> questionnaire

Lloro - QC: ……ヱリカさんも、自分の部屋の鍵穴、確認するんですね。
Naegles - QC2: ...Erika-san, did you also inspect the lock to your room?

Lloro - QC:
お昼まで錠を忘れていた不用心な私が、今頃になって用心深くする
というのも滑稽な話ですけれどね。
Naegles - QC2: It's funny. I carelessly left my door unlocked until noon, and now I'm being cautious about yours.
NOTES: check
column6: this is fine, maybe could be tailored to erika more

Lloro - QC: いやに慎重なヱリカさんを残して、あたしたちは客室に入る。
Naegles - QC2: Leaving behind that terribly cautious Erika-san, the rest of us entered our room.

Lloro - QC: はーー！　やっとこれ脱げるねぇ！
Naegles - QC2: Haaaah! Finally, I can take this off!

Lloro - QC: くぅ～疲れました！　これにて撮影旅行も完結です！
Naegles - QC2: Aaahhh, I'm so tired! That does it for our photography trip!

Lloro - QC: 私、シャワー、イッチバン乗り～♪
Naegles - QC2: Hope you don't mind if I shower first♪

Lloro - QC:
はああぁ？！　それは一番頑張って汗をかいた私が先でしょう
が！！
Naegles - QC2: Huhhhh?! I should go first since I was the one working hard and sweating my ass off!!

Lloro - QC:
早い者勝ちでーす♪　お姉は汗臭いまま、私のシャワーの水音でも
聞いてて下さい。
Naegles - QC2: First come, first served♪ You can sweat there and listen to the running water in my shower.

Lloro - QC:
またしても、小さな子供たちのように服を乱雑に脱ぎ捨てて、園
崎姉妹は全裸で同時にシャワー室に飛び込んでいく……。
Naegles - QC2: Once again, the Sonozakis bicker like little children, throw off their clothes and enter the bathroom at the same time, completely naked...

Lloro - QC:
……異性の目がないところでは、自分の性別を忘れるって話があ
るけれど。
Naegles - QC2: ...They say you forget about your sex when in the absence of the other.

Lloro - QC:
あたしは誰の目がなくとも、もう少し気を遣おうと思いま
す……。
Naegles - QC2: I think I'll be a bit more careful, even when nobody is watching...
NOTES: plan to -> think I'll

Lloro - QC: ……よかった。あたしのベッド、何もない。
Naegles - QC2: ...That's a relief. There's nothing on my bed.

Lloro - QC:
念入りに、枕をひっくり返してみたり、ベッドの下を覗きこんだ
りと調べてみたが、おかしな悪戯はなかった。
Naegles - QC2: I carefully turned over my pillow and looked under my bed. No sign of any ridiculous pranks.

Lloro - QC: ………最後の夜くらい、……ゆっくりと眠れそうだわ……。
Naegles - QC2: ...I think I can sleep in peace... on this final night...

Lloro - QC: キャアアアアアアァアァアァァアァァ……！！！
Naegles - QC2: KYAAAAAAAA...!!!

Lloro - QC:
それは紛れもなく隣室のヱリカの声だった。
　あまり厚くないとはいえ、壁越しにもわかるほどの……、悲鳴
だった。
Naegles - QC2: That was undoubtedly Erika's voice coming from the next room. The walls aren't very thick, so it was easy to realize... that it was a scream.
NOTES: from "That scream could be heard through the walls, thin as they were.

Lloro - QC: みみ、魅音さんッ、詩音さんッ！　隣から悲鳴が……！！
Naegles - QC2: M-M-Mion-san, Shion-san! That scream came from next door...!!

Lloro - QC: 何？　どうしたの……？
Naegles - QC2: Huh? What's wrong...?

Lloro - QC: 隣から悲鳴、って……、まさかヱリカさん？
Naegles - QC2: A scream from next door... could that be Erika-san?

Lloro - QC:
となれば、園崎姉妹の行動は早い。バスタオル姿のまま、廊下に
飛び出す。
Naegles - QC2: The concerned Sonozaki sisters acted fast, putting on bath towels and running into the hallway.

Lloro - QC:
廊下には、ヱリカさんがへたり込んで、開け放たれた自室の中を
指さしている。
Naegles - QC2: There, Erika-san was sunken down on the floor and pointing towards the inside of her wide-open room.

Lloro - QC: ……ぁわ……ぁわわわ………。
Naegles - QC2: ...Ahhhh... uwaaaaaa...

Lloro - QC: どしたの？！　何があったの？！
Naegles - QC2: Are you alright?! What happened?!

Lloro - QC: あのヱリカさんが……、こんなに怯えるなんて……。
Naegles - QC2: For that Erika-san to get... frightened as much as this...
NOTES: from "Can't believe I'd ever see Erika-san frightened like this...

Lloro - QC: 部屋の中に何かあるんですか？！　失礼しますね！
Naegles - QC2: Is there something wrong inside your room?! I'm coming in!
NOTES: Let me through! -> I'm coming in!

Lloro - QC: 詩音さんはスタンガンを握り締めながら室内に飛び込む。
Naegles - QC2: Shion-san gripped her stun gun tightly and leapt into the room.

Lloro - QC:
え、ちょっと待って。どうしてシャワー室からタオル姿で飛び出
してきたのにスタンガンがあるの……。
　これは突っ込んだら負けか……。
Naegles - QC2: Wait a minute, she just ran out of the bathroom with a towel! Why does she have a stun gun...?! I give up...

Lloro - QC: ……わ、私のベッドに……ベッドに…………。
Naegles - QC2: ...M-My bed... my bed has...

Lloro - QC: くっくっく。……これはこれは、……やられたねぇ？
Naegles - QC2: *cackle*cackle* ...Well, well, well... did they get ya?
NOTES: what have we here -> did they get ya

Lloro - QC: これ……、あたしのと同じ魔法陣……。
Naegles - QC2: This is... the same magic circle I saw...

Lloro - QC: ここにもシャワー室にも、誰もいません。
Naegles - QC2: There's no one in here or in the bathroom.

Lloro - QC: こんな……こんなことって、……ひぃ……ひぃ………。
Naegles - QC2: This is... this is... hic... hic......

Lloro - QC: あのヱリカさんが取り乱すなんて……。
Naegles - QC2: Erika-san was visibly upset.

Lloro - QC:
いや、考えてみれば無理もない。……ヱリカさんは、犯人側なの
だ。
　それなのに、彼女の部屋に魔法陣が現れてしまった。
Naegles - QC2: No, thinking about it, this was a reasonable reaction... Erika-san must be on the culprit's side. And yet, a magic circle has mysteriously appeared inside her room.

Lloro - QC: まさか、そんな……。本当に……魔女の#p祟#sたた#rり………。
Naegles - QC2: Impossible, this couldn't really be... a witch's curse?

Lloro - QC: ヱ、……ヱリカさん、……しっかり……。
Naegles - QC2: E-Erika-san, calm down...

Lloro - QC:
あの挑発的なヱリカさんが、これほどに弱々しい姿を見せると
は……。
Naegles - QC2: The provocative Erika-san now looked so frail and weak...

Lloro - QC:
だからむしろ、これほどに……、恐ろしい。あたしまで足が竦ん
でくる……。
Naegles - QC2: The sight of her like this... was far more terrifying. Even I was frozen with fear...
NOTES: from "It was... terrible to look at

Lloro - QC:
えっと………。午前中いっぱいは確か、施錠をし忘れてたんだよ
ね……？
Naegles - QC2: Um... this morning, you said you didn't lock your door... right?

Lloro - QC:
そ、そうですそうですっ。でも、あの後、ちゃんと施錠しまし
た……ッ。
Naegles - QC2: Y-Yes, that's right... But after that, I made very sure to lock my door... nnh.

Lloro - QC: その時。部屋に入ってますよね？　室内に異常はありましたか？
Naegles - QC2: And at that time, you entered your room, right? You didn't find anything weird inside?

Lloro - QC: ないですッ。ある訳がない！！
Naegles - QC2: Nothing at all! That would be impossible!!

Lloro - QC:
だとすると、ヱリカさんは確か、午前中には鍵をし忘れているけれ
ど、その時間には悪戯はされていない。
Naegles - QC2: If that's the case, Erika-san, then when you left your door unlocked, there were no pranks left there at all.

Lloro - QC: 犯行は、施錠してから開けるまで、ってことになりますね？
Naegles - QC2: The crime was committed between the time the door was locked and the time it was opened, right?

Lloro - QC:
……あたしのシーツに描かれた魔法陣と同じで、絵の具で描かれて
いるようです。
Naegles - QC2: ...It looks just like the magic circle that was on my sheets, and it uses the same paint.

Lloro - QC: うん。普通の水彩絵の具、だねぇ……。
Naegles - QC2: Yeah. It's just ordinary watercolor paint, if I'm right...

Lloro - QC:
……最初は透明で、時間の経過で浮き上がってくるような手品染み
たものじゃない。
Naegles - QC2: ...It's a trick where it's transparent at first, but as time passes, the stain starts to show up more and more.
NOTES: check
column6: from "...From the start, this wasn't the kind of magic trick that becomes obvious as time goes on.

Lloro - QC: となると、……犯行は、鍵を開けた直後しか考えられない。
Naegles - QC2: As far as this crime goes... it could only have been committed immediately after opening the door.
NOTES: from "It's impossible, but

Lloro - QC: …………ヱリカさん。正直に答えて下さいね。
Naegles - QC2: ...Erika-san. Please give us an honest answer, okay?

Lloro - QC: 何？　話しますよっ。聞かれれば何でも！
Naegles - QC2: What? I'll tell you. Anything you want!

Lloro - QC:
あの賢いヱリカさんが、何を疑われているのか、想像出来ないな
んて。
　……あたしでさえ、その疑念が最初に浮かんだのだから……。
Naegles - QC2: As if we couldn't suspect that clever Erika-san... Even I could guess that right away...

Lloro - QC: 自作自演、……じゃないですよね？
Naegles - QC2: ...You're faking this, aren't you?

Lloro - QC:
ヱリカさんは、一度も見せたことのない表情を浮かべる。
　目を見開き、引きつった表情は……、衝撃と呆然の、双方を同時
に浮かべたものだった……。
Naegles - QC2: I had never seen such a look on Erika-san's face. Her eyes widened, and her expression was one of both shock and dumbfoundedness.
